title: i get permabanned for nothing
body: get permabanned for protecting myself when the pyke support is calling me a whore. and the pyke is purposely inting in the game and i get permabanned from that? this is stupid in many ways

replies.body:
> protecting myself

No, you got banned for some incredibly overkill flaming.

You can protect yourself by muting, not running your mouth and making the trolls happy.
Sounds like a bug if you got banned for muting someone. Send a support ticket!
Were you in some sort of danger that you needed to protect yourself from?
chat logs. otherwise we're all going to assume your "protecting yourself" was flaming back at the pyke
